net.c0nan.dhs.cs.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • net.c0nan.dhs.cs.server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, IServer

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Thread
implements IServer
    The class Server extends Thread implements IServer has a threaded method to avoid hanging up the VM and listens for connection on the set port, which will receive a file path which calls the fileHelper to get the file content and streams the content back to the client over the network connection. The class Server can be invoked without the network listener and the content of a file can be read.
    Author:
    Jannie Date: 2013/07/13
